name: Ari Royal Pink
description: A pink dress that radiates finesse and romance, designed to emphasize the natural elegance of the silhouette. Features diamonds that shine with scarves hanging from the neck for luxury appeal.

name: Diva
description: A black masterpiece adorned with delicate floral details. Where luxury meets timeless sophistication.

name: Lumi
description: LUMI is a vision of modern elegance. Featuring intricate crystal embellishments, dramatic puff sleeves, and fluid cape drapes, this gown delivers refined glamour with a bold couture edge â€” perfect for unforgettable evening moments. Features sculpted figure-hugging silhouette, hand-embellished crystal detailing, statement puff sleeves, flowing draped cape panels, and elegant floor-length finish.

name: Royal Lilac
description: A gown of elegance and grace, adorned with shimmering beads and flowing capes, making every step a statement of royalty. Features a figure-hugging silhouette adorned with intricate hand-beaded pearls and crystals, with flowing cape sleeves adding a dramatic and unique effect.

name: Lilac Queen Gown
description: Elegant lavender gown embellished with crystals and luxurious details. Features an illusion neckline, figure-hugging silhouette, and a long flowing cape for a glamorous look. Perfect for special events and gala evenings.

name: Ellea
description: ELLEA is the definition of refined glamour. Designed with a sculpted silhouette, delicate embellishments, and a flowing cape with an elegant train, this gown radiates confidence and sophistication. Features glamorous fitted silhouette, elegant cape with dramatic flow, luxurious hand-embellished details, soft illusion sleeves, and statement train for red-carpet impact.

name: Midnight Gold
description: A black couture gown with gold details, designed for elegance and shine. An elegant black evening gown with gold embroidery and a figure-hugging silhouette. A luxurious choice for gala nights and special occasions.

name: Maison
description: A nude dress that emphasizes the body, with some green leaves and a variety of stones that shine as much as the dress. Something you need to shine at any party to inspire and feel special and elegant.

name: Solar Elegance
description: The rays of the sun embrace this majestic gown with a long train, illuminating the elegance and beauty of every woman with every step.

name: Vlera
description: The Royale Vlera is a magnificent dress in deep cherry color, symbolizing passion, power, and timeless elegance.

name: Crimson Empress
description: One-shoulder gown in deep red velvet, adorned with lavish crystal embellishments that radiate power and feminine luxury. Crimson Empress features a sheer, hand-embroidered bodice with sparkling crystals and bold velvet floral appliqués. The flowing velvet drape and asymmetric design create a regal and dramatic silhouette — perfect for grand entrances and red-carpet moments.

name: Arbennelle Gold
description: A golden gown with unique handcrafted detailing cascading gracefully, designed to radiate elegance and charm with every step. Handcrafted golden elegance: Arbennelle Gold blends luxurious detail with timeless style.

name: Mont Enneigè
description: Handcrafted with refined details featuring a clean design and a half cape secured at the waist, adorned with shimmering diamonds. Designed for women who own every room they enter.
color: Multiple (Black, Brown, Fuchsia, Gold, Lilac, Navy Blue, Orange, Pink, Red)

name: Seraphina
description: An evening/bridal wear dress with customization options available.

name: Sahara Glow
description: Yellow sand color, ruffled detail from waist up to shoulder, exaggerated large crystal choker necklace, one side tail and silver rhinestones.
color: Sand Yellow (also available in: Burgundy, Green, Mint, Navy Blue, Orange, Pale Pink, Red, Yellow)
